nodes.text: The Eamus system was located in the Southern Core portion of the Core Worlds. It contained at least one sun, and the terrestrial astronomical object Eamus 6 occupied the sixth orbital position within the system.

When solar flares caused devastating quakes on Eamus 6 at some point between 2 BBY and 0 BBY, the Imperial Senator Leia Organa visited the Eamus system on her consular starship, the Tantive IV, to bring emergency gear and medical supplies to the celestial body's population.
The Eamus system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square L-13.
